techmeme.title: Apple Intelligence in iOS 18.1 hands-on: a mixed bag with nice Photos updates, useful Type to Siri, a fancy Siri animation, but some features don't work well (John Voorhees/MacStories)
Source: Meta is working on a search engine that provides conversational answers about current events for Meta AI users, to reduce its reliance on Google (Kalley Huang/The Information)
Apple launches some Apple Intelligence features like writing tools and notification summaries, as part of iOS 18.1, iPadOS 18.1, and macOS 15.1, released today (Brian Heater/TechCrunch)
Apple refreshes the 24" iMac with M4, Thunderbolt 4, 16GB+ of RAM, a nano-texture screen option, and a 12MP webcam, starting at $1,299 and shipping November 8 (Joe Rossignol/MacRumors)
Armis, which provides risk management tools, raised $200M led by General Catalyst and Alkeon at a $4.2B valuation ahead of a 2026 IPO, and passed $200M in ARR (Lynn Doan/Bloomberg)
